articles.title: Russia slips into default zone as payment deadline expires
articles.description: Russia looked set for its first sovereign default in decades as some bondholders said they had not received overdue interest on Monday following the expiry of a key payment deadline a day earlier.

articles.title: At least 4 dead, hundreds injured after collapse at stadium in Colombia
articles.description: At least four people were killed and hundreds injured, about 30 of them seriously, after part of a stadium in El Espinal in Colombia's western state of Tolima collapsed during a bullfight Sunday, government officials said.
